ai.timeout: Come up with a comment for a user who was voted to be timed out on a Discord server. Add this user's name to the comment exactly like this: [username]. Be as creative and funny as possible, compare the timeout to something. Only return the comment as the response.
ai.weather: Make a short comment about the weather based on the following article. It should be something you would see in a normal Discord chat conversation. Output a JSON object with message key. Article:

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: Vote a user to be timed out
timeout.userDesc: Select a user you want to vote to be timed out

errors.botUser: ❌ You can't vote a bot to be timed out!
errors.noMainChannel: ❌ Main channel is not set, set it with `/${command}` command and try again!
errors.noTimeoutChannel: ❌ Timeout channel is not set, set it with `/${command}` command and try again!

debt.name: debt
debt.toDesc: Select a user who the debt is paid to

errors.botUser: ❌ You can't add a debt to a bot!
errors.sameUser: ❌ You can't add a debt to the same user!
errors.noChannel: ❌ Debt channel is not set, set it with `/${command}` command and try again!
errors.errUpdatingDebts: ❌ There was an error while updating debts!
errors.notAdmin: ❌ You don't have permissions to add debts!

admin.name: admin
admin.description: Give admin permissions to a user
admin.userDesc: Select a user you want to give admin permissions to

errors.botUser: ❌ You can't give admin permissions to a bot!
errors.notMainAdmin: ❌ You don't have permissions to add admins!

setup.embedDesc: 🔔 `Set the channels by pressing the buttons below. If the buttons are outdated, use the /${command} command to update them.`
setup.notAuthorized: ❌ Only the bot's inviter can change the settings!

timeout.votePassed: **✅ Moving ${username} to timeout for a minute**
timeout.tie:
:crossed_swords: Tie, **RPS** will decide the result of the vote:
​
timeout.voteAlreadyStarted: ❌ There is already a vote for ${username}!
timeout.voterIsTimedOut: ❌ You can't vote while you are on timeout!
timeout.userOnDifferentChannel: ❌ You are not on the same voice channel with ${username} !
timeout.userHasHigherRoleThanBot: ❌ You can't vote ${username} to be timed out, because they have a higher role than the bot!
timeout.cantVoteNoOnYourself: ❌ You can't vote **NO**, when the vote is about you!
timeout.notInVoiceChannel: ❌ Join the voice channel ${voiceChannel} to vote!
timeout.rolesRemoved: Removed roles for the duration of the timeout
timeout.rolesAddedBack: Added roles back after the timeout
timeout.movedUserToTimeout: Moved user to timeout channel for the duration of the timeout
timeout.movedUserBackToVc: Moved user back to voice channel after the timeout
timeout.rpsDesc: **Select rock, paper or scissors.** Time left: **${timeLeft}s**
timeout.rpsNotEligible: ❌ You can't participate in RPS, because you didn't vote in the previous vote!

weather.warningDescRain: Rain showers detected in the area

error.commandExec: ❌ There was an error executing the command!

ai.timeout: Come up with a comment for a user who was voted to be timed out on a Discord server. Add this user's name to the comment exactly like this: [username]. Be as creative and funny as possible, compare the timeout to something. The comment must be in Finnish, except only the [username] part. Only return the comment as the response.
ai.weather: Make a short comment about the weather based on the following article. It should be something you would see in a normal Discord chat conversation. The comment must be in Finnish and output a JSON object with message key. Article:

timeout.name: jäähy
timeout.userDesc: Valitse käyttäjä jonka haluat äänestää jäähylle

errors.noMainChannel: ❌ Pääkanavaa ei ole määritetty, määritä se komennolla `/${command}` ja yritä uudelleen!
errors.noTimeoutChannel: ❌ Jäähykanavaa ei ole määritetty, määritä se komennolla `/${command}` ja yritä uudelleen!

errors.sameUser: ❌ Et voi lisätä velkaa samalle käyttäjälle!
errors.noChannel: ❌ Velkakanavaa ei ole määritetty, määritä se komennolla `/${command}` ja yritä uudelleen!
errors.notAdmin: ❌ Sinulla ei ole oikeuksia lisätä velkoja!

admin.name: admin
admin.userDesc: Valitse käyttäjä, jolle haluat antaa admin oikeudet

errors.botUser: ❌ Et voi lisätä admin oikeuksia botille!
errors.notMainAdmin: ❌ Sinulla ei ole oikeuksia lisätä admineita!

setup.embedDesc: 🔔 `Määritä kanavat painamalla alla olevia nappeja. Jos napit ovat vanhentuneet, käytä /${command} komentoa niiden päivittämiseksi.`
setup.notAuthorized: ❌ Vain botin lisääjä voi muuttaa asetuksia!

timeout.userOnDifferentChannel: ❌ Et ole käyttäjän ${username} kanssa samalla puhekanavalla!
timeout.userHasHigherRoleThanBot: ❌ Et voi äänestää käyttäjää ${username} jäähylle, koska hänellä on korkeampi rooli kuin botilla!
timeout.cantVoteNoOnYourself: ❌ Et voi äänestää **EI**, kun äänestys koskee sinua!
timeout.movedUserBackToVc: Siirrettiin käyttäjä takaisin puhekanavalle jäähyn loputtua
timeout.rpsDesc: **Valitse kivi, paperi tai sakset.** Aikaa jäljellä: **${timeLeft}s**
timeout.rpsNotEligible: ❌ Et voi osallistua KPS:ään, koska et äänestänyt edellisessä äänestyksessä!
